summary: The aspirant nun Céline van Hadewijch is invited to leave the convent where she studies and she returns to the house of her parents in Paris. Céline meets her outcast Muslim teenage friend ... See full summary »
cast: Julie Sokolowski|Karl Sarafidis|Yassine Salime|David Dewaele|Brigitte Mayeux-Clerget|Michelle Ardenne|Sabrina Lechêne|Marie Castelain|Luc-François Bouyssonie
